title: tour: Page "range" is not clear
body:
Context: /moretypes/12

There was insufficient information on the page for "range" to explain the associated code. Having not read the documentation for range I was not aware that i and v are both values returned by the range function - representing the index and value of each element of pow - and it took me a while to come to that realisation. I did not immediately realise that i and v were separated by a  comma as opposed to the semicolon I expected to see. This could be made clearer with a more verbose description.
